title: Indian visa application centre in Dhaka to close Wednesday afternoon
body: All applicants with appointment slots scheduled for submission today will be rescheduled for a later date In view of the ongoing security situation, the Indian Visa Application Centre in Dhaka will close at 2pm on Wednesday. "In view of the ongoing security situation, we wish to bring to your kind notice that IVAC JFP Dhaka will be closed at 2pm today," said a notification issued by the IVAC in Dhaka. All applicants with appointment slots scheduled for submission today will be rescheduled for a later date. The Indian Visa Application Centre (IVAC) at Jamuna Future Park (JFP) in Dhaka is the main, integrated center for all Indian visa services in the capital.
